urls.title: Make a change | Help Centre | Virgin Atlantic
urls.description: You can now rebook through our new web messaging service from 8am to 8pm UK time. Just hit the chat button on the bottom right of this page. If you’re conta cting us from the US outside of these hours, you can log into your booking and use the chat button on the bottom right of the page up until 8pm Pacific Standard Time. If you refresh the page or navigate away you'll lose your chat, and no one wants that. Also, this one's just for making changes to your date or destination, so if you need help with

urls.description: You can now rebook through our new web messaging service from 8am to 8pm UK time. Just hit the chat button on the bottom right of this page. If you’re conta cting us from the US outside of these hours, you can log into your booking and use the chat button on the bottom right of the page up until 8pm Pacific Standard Time. urls.description: You can now rebook through our new web messaging service from 8am to 8pm UK time. Just hit the chat button on the bottom right of this page.
